title: The Silent Hour
plot: A detective with hearing loss and a deaf witness to a murder must lean on each other to outsmart killers they can't hear coming when cornered in an abandoned apartment block.

subtitles.author: VikramJS
lines: 53588 55389 REPORTER: (ON TV) You can see the temperatures

117317 119186 (CHUCKLES)
Of course I'm gonna be there.
119252 120855 Have I ever missed one before?

122757 124626 Well, if I told you,
it wouldn't be a surprise,

124692 126527 now would it?
Hey, Sam, ask your mother

126594 127929 if she needs me
to bring anything

129396 133133 Yeah, just...
make sure she knows I asked.
140642 143678 It has a neck, but no arms or legs.
145479 148082 Yeah, I got you a snake. Highly venomous, too.

160995 162396 You're gonna need
to slow down, Shaw.

166299 167935 Didn't even need

For doing our job. Fuck IA.

Super Cop?

FRANK: What?
They don't have, like,

DOUG: That's funny.

206306 207775 DOUG: So, they can have

208943 211445 while serving a community
that hates their guts?

211512 213047 FRANK: Yeah, don't forget
that gold watch.

214749 217151 Hey, if you need help, dude,
you know I got your back.

217952 220320 You're drowning in alimony, pal.
What are you gonna do,

221689 223958 Fuck you.
I'm serious, though, you know?

230965 233467 Foreman didn't say anything
about him being on a break.

233835 235335 Could've taken him alone
at his spot,

235402 236971 if that fucking warrant
came in sooner.

238106 239674 Let's, uh...
let's just take it easy.

243443 245513 Hey, I'm Frank Shaw.
This is Dougie Slater.

245580 247081 We're from Homicide.
How are you?

250417 252053 and stepping over here

253955 255288 This will just take a minute.

260061 262797 Come on Jimmy, jump to it.
Let's go. Step over here.

274709 276210 Whoa, whoa, whoa!
Whoa, whoa, whoa!

276276 278546 Get back! Move.
Whoa! Whoa! Hey, hey, hey!

278613 280815 I said put the gun down
and get the fuck back!

282650 284986 Just take a breath!
Shut up! Put it down!

285186 288122 Just do it, Frank, put it down.
I said put the gun down!

288189 289422 DOUG: Put it down.
DENT: Get the fuck back!

387521 389991 But you're out,
so get on your fucking knees.

479347 484618 (STATIC HISSING OVER EARPIECE)
(INDISTINCT CHATTER ON TV)

557958 559894 Hey, listen,
you don't need to...

561028 563731 Okay, all right,
I'm reading. Yeah.
573707 575209 I asked if you were-- FRANK: Yeah, I know,

575276 578913 coming to the recital.
Yeah, I got it, I got it.
579480 582283 I got one for you. You ready? Okay.

602236 604905 Yeah, you like that?
I learned that one just for you.
605139 608642 I'm happy you're practicing. It's good. You need to.
614682 617118 Come on, Dad. You never missed one before.
618119 619453 SAM: You don't need to sit with Mom.
619554 621222 Um... It's fine. I don't care anymore.
621322 622990 I'm so over that. FRANK: No, no. It's... it's...

623057 626193 it's not about that.
You know, I'm not...

627194 630831 I'm not good in...
in crowds, and, uh...
631832 632833 I just don't know how much

632900 634135 I'd be able
to really appreciate--
634201 636070 The school can arrange for a hearing assistant,
640040 641842 I would not want that. SAM: Dad!
642376 644945 This is important to me. You gave me that guitar.
645012 647114 I want you to see how good I am. (HEARING AID SCREECHES)
655524 657258 I... I can't hear you. Um.
699300 700768 in this one. I fixed it.

701035 702671 FRANK: I knew something
was wrong.

703404 706040 Yeah, but it's not just
the hearing aids, Frank.

706473 709276 The damage to your cochlea,
it's becoming more progressive.

709743 711712 Back in July,
you got 50 percent,

711779 714583 and now you're down
to 30 percent.

721523 725627 Well, in another eleven,
I can't say with any certainty

725694 727962 how much ability
you'll have left.

760828 763330 You should listen to her.
She's smart.
764566 766534 I don't see much point myself.

768335 770605 (SIGHS) Look, this isn't
the first time I'm saying this,

770672 773742 but... because of the nature
of your injury,
773807 775510 implants may not be an option.
776010 778178 And more exposure to loud noises

778245 780682 could lead
to even further damage.
(SOFT TENSE MUSIC PLAYING)

780749 782617 You need to start
preparing yourself

782684 785853 for the possibility of a more
profound loss in the future.

844178 845979 Hey, good to see you back,
my man.
Hey, hey, hey.

851151 853788 Hey. You don't need
to shout, all right?

853854 855889 I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
(CAMERA SHUTTER CLICKING)

856156 859126 Okay, we got two mid-level
dealers, late twenties,

859493 861495 single shots to the head,
execution style.

865132 867134 This guy stumbled upon 'em
about an hour ago,

867201 869370 but the medical examiner thinks
that the hit happened

874809 876544 FRANK: Excuse me, sir.
I got this.

877878 880147 Frank Shaw. Homicide.
How you doing?

880247 882316 Okay. Good.
Can you tell me
what happened here?

882416 886186 WITNESS: (FAINTLY) I was going,
looking for a place to sleep...
(BLADES WHIRRING INTENSIFIES)

886253 888088 ...and I...
I came across this guy.

888188 890991 Uh, sorry, sir, can you, um,

891225 893628 They were in my spot,
these guys were...

905607 908008 (TENSE MUSIC STOPS)
WITNESS: They're there,
they shouldn't be there.

908075 911445 This isn't-- It's my spot.
That's where I have to be.

972206 976410 I'm a detective. I detect.
Can I get a beer?

982349 985553 (SIGHS) So, how's the new beat
with the narc squad?

996163 998198 Kind of miss the view
from the sixth floor, though.

1002135 1004004 BARTENDER:
It's on the house, Detective.

1013715 1016483 Come on, Frank, there's plenty

1019253 1021689 I don't know.
What the fuck do you call--
Deaf.
1023892 1024893 You know what I'm trying to say.

1024959 1026260 There's plenty of them
on the force.

1029062 1030330 you're better than half
the assholes out there.

1032366 1034536 Why? What are you gonna do?
You going to walk away?

1038540 1041041 The gold watch?
Fuck that, that's not you.

1041108 1043377 You'd go crazy.
Police is in your blood.

1046548 1049116 Fuck am I going to do?
(DOOR CHIME RINGING)

1064666 1067467 Might have a lead
on those Hyde Park hits.

1079246 1081649 Official interpreter's off duty
till next week.

1087154 1088890 I'm not
a fucking interpreter, Doug.

1089489 1091793 Brass says it can't wait.
It'll only take half an hour.

1091859 1094428 And look, this isn't me
just looking for help on a case.

1094494 1096430 This is a way for us
to get you back out there,

1096496 1097865 get you back
on your feet, you know,
1097932 1099000 so you get your feet wet again.

1103170 1106106 You help me, I help you.
That's what partners do.
1112880 1114448 I don't know, maybe I miss that.

1123524 1126293 I don't even have my weapon.
I'm off-duty.
1150785 1152920 (HEAVY METAL MUSIC PLAYS IN DISTANCE) Thirty-three years old.
1152987 1154589 She was in the alley that night.
1156490 1158860 Called it in via the 911 relay this morning.
1160360 1161829 FRANK: But the hit was on Wednesday night.
1163397 1165399 DOUG: Well, that's what we're going there to find out, partner.

they've saddled me with,

1381749 1383818 Does she... does she read lips?

1395529 1398398 She was out,

1422723 1424258 man 2: Can we talk about this? man 1: All right.

1447682 1451152 It was a full moon.

1462863 1465099 Do you know any of these people?

1503871 1505439 D, she can't see
your fucking face.

1506841 1511379 Uh, Ms. Fremont,

1511812 1513447 because that video file
is evidence,
1513514 1514782 but you'll get the phone back.

to write down

1520888 1522723 everything you've told us
here today,

1522790 1525092 and then you can read through it
and tell me

1525159 1527962 whether it's exactly
as you've described. Okay?

1628863 1631132 While you were pissing,

1632233 1634401 A couple of minors
for possession, stints in rehab.

1635035 1637004 Found a Naloxone kit
in her bathroom.

1638239 1640741 So, she was not out
taking pretty photos that night.

1645146 1647047 This place
must have been nice once.

1648115 1649783 I wonder what these units
will go for.

1650451 1652786 When I hear about those perps,

1693628 1695896 You gotta be fucking kidding me.

IN THE DISTANCE)

1845079 1847247 shut up. All right? Be cool.

1979046 1980882 Hey.

2005874 2007709 South side! Take the stairs!

2025392 2027294 You understand me? Do not shoot.

2104104 2105540 They didn't have time
to make it to the lobby,

2105607 2107075 so they're still
in this building.

2107508 2109343 There's so many goddamn places

2111746 2113681 I'm just saying,
if that dude has a phone,

2118418 2120755 Just take that elevator down

2121089 2122690 Go help Sal keep watch

2184451 2186721 I don't give a shit.

(SCOFFS)

2212613 2214582 The elevator,
what floor it's on,

2217384 2218619 Look, I'll stay here
and hold point.

2218720 2220621 No, no, no.
SIMMS:
Take the fire escapes outside.

2220688 2221923 Fuck off, dickhead.
SIMMS: The fuck?

2253654 2256256 They have to have someone
that's working for them

2264364 2267501 You called it in
this morning, right?

2271105 2272874 Probably in dispatch,
just waiting to let them know

2272940 2275442 if anyone reports anything
about those murders.

2285318 2287420 ran your file,
so they got a look at it too.
2287722 2289322 They knew what you were into.
2297364 2298933 You went out looking to score.

2304272 2306941 I saw your overdose kit
in your bathroom,

2311411 2314615 Hey, I'm risking
my fucking ass here for you.

2331532 2335570 So, why did you wait two days

2385620 2387454 We need to find a phone.

2391391 2396429 How many people
still in the building?
2413247 2415448 But I meant on this floor.

2430430 2434568 Hey, sweetheart.
You here for the party?
2444045 2446514 Mother Teresa's on her way up. MASON: Good.

2447782 2449850 Have them sweep
from the ground up,
2476310 2478179 I'll be back. But lock the door.

to the left--

2517785 2521622 No, I... I know the rules.
One, no names.

2523858 2526260 of any illegal activities
are to be discussed.

2526794 2528696 Three. I would
only participate in a job

2528763 2530131 that was agreed
through the broker.

2531232 2533934 In return, I will not reveal
any details of the job

2534001 2537304 to any third parties,
including law enforcement.
2537571 2538773 Do you agree to these rules?
2538839 2541510 Yes, yes, I agree to your rules.

2541575 2543277 Now, would you please
help the man?

2623924 2625960 SAL: Hey, the fucking
infantry's arrived.
2676110 2678145 but you better believe they're looking for one
2679947 2681949 Find out which of these apartments are still occupied
2685786 2688122 Make this clean. We don't want any witnesses.
2698432 2701502 connected to this building is rerouted to us.

2702770 2704972 If any of them get out,
if they talk to anyone,
2705406 2708543 then we are fucked. You understand that, right?

2709343 2711445 Everyone's got everything
on the line here,
2711513 2713214 so do not fuck this up.

2766568 2769003 That means they're gonna
control every exit point,

2793528 2796063 They'll have someone down there.
They'll see us.

2887921 2890424 Shit, he's on a phone.
It's an intercom.

2903237 2905740 ...hostage situation
at the York Building in Roxbury.
2908475 2910578 please, hold... I can't hear anything, so just listen.

2913046 2915449 Department C6,
and tell him to send units

2915550 2917519 to the York Building
in Roxbury, sixth floor.
2917619 2919654 AUTOMATED VOICE: ...are busy at the moment.
2924893 2927629 OPERATOR: Bedford Security, how can we help you? Hello?
2960528 2961729 Oh, fuck, he's got a weapon.

2965600 2967735 Motherfucker,
he took out the fucking camera.
2969537 2971205 Okay, I got him on ten.
2975275 2976511 What the fuck are you doing?

2983952 2985620 Nine! They're getting off
at nine!

3031465 3035135 What the fuck?
I said no gunfire.

3036436 3038038 Yeah, but we don't
know that yet.

3038338 3040073 We're going to check
every goddamn apartment
3040140 3042577 on this floor. Now, go, go.

3046915 3049149 JAKE: BPD.
Anyone home? Open up.

3071405 3073608 Don't fucking move. I'll blow
your fucking brains out.

3108643 3110645 Get on the floor or she's dead.
(ANGEL LAUGHING)

3118586 3122122 You dumb, deaf fuck
with an empty gun.

3137772 3139907 They're here right now!
Both of them are here right now!

3191324 3193326 (GROANS)
MASON: Hey,
where the hell are they?

3195697 3197799 MASON: What happened?
Where are they?

3201401 3204438 Fuck. They were here
and then they, uh...

3225526 3228261 Hey, hey! What were

3228328 3229997 Why did they leave my gun?

3234334 3236369 what the fuck
were they doing in here, huh?

3245278 3247782 Fuck, man!
And I just bought that, too.

3247949 3250551 Here, take this fucking gun.
ANGEL: All right.

3276944 3279446 ANGEL: No, no. Wait.
He can't hear anything.

3279814 3282617 The medic was talking to him,

3282884 3284919 MASON: The man wears
hearing aids, Angel.

3289590 3292392 He's gonna call 911 and dispatch
is gonna lead us right to him.

3292459 3294327 MASON: Well,
maybe he's smarter than that.

3303604 3306774 Yeah, I need you to run
a trace on a cell. Yes, now.
3320521 3322256 All I hear is that music, man.
3325259 3326694 Just go that way. Go, go.

3335368 3338573 (CAR HORN HONKS)
SIMMS: Fuck off,
will you?

3342710 3344912 You want me to get the fuck
out of the way? Why don't you--

3363164 3366100 (CAR HORN BLARING)
SIMMS: Get the fuck out
of the truck, asshole.

3376177 3379412 Come on, get out the truck.
Get this bullshit out of here.

3379479 3382250 Simms, stop playing
goddamn traffic cop

3384451 3386888 Where in the fuck
are these people?

3387387 3389690 Does anyone have
anything at all?

3394295 3396230 And can someone
please find the asshole

3397698 3399734 and clear him
the fuck out of here?
3466499 3468703 What the hell is going on? Doug, wait, listen.

3468803 3471072 I... I can't hear shit.
My hearing aids are toast.

3473341 3475409 Listen, Doug,
I'm with Ava Fremont,

3477244 3479647 Look, she's in danger.
And I am too.

3479714 3482516 I can't hear a fucking thing,
so I need you to put your face

3482583 3484518 close to the screen
when you're talking,

3484618 3486420 Ava's gonna try
to... to read your lips
3486486 3488189 and tell me what you're saying.

3496430 3498199 ANGEL: This shit's
falling apart, man.

3501369 3502870 What if they send units?
No, no, no.

3502970 3504705 Farrell and Potter,
they'll pull rank,

3504772 3506974 let everybody know that
we have it all under control,

3509543 3511045 The overdose story
don't work no more.

3511112 3512446 MASON: Angel,
we're gonna be the ones

3514115 3517218 Whatever we say is
the story is the story.

3517318 3520087 Yeah, well, what if we just
threaten them instead, huh?

3520321 3521922 What if, uh,
you know, we tell them,

3521989 3523824 if they talk, we'll come
after them and their family?

3523891 3528429 You really think that this guy
is intimidated by us? Hmm?

3528596 3530331 I don't know.
MASON: If someone here talks,

3531665 3534201 And someone will break,
you better believe that.

3536170 3539140 You really think that Simms
is gonna keep his mouth shut,

3539473 3540641 if it means covering
his own ass?

3542710 3545679 You really wanna bet
your future on some patrol cop?

3547481 3549884 All right, then, look, brother,
listen to me, listen to me.

3550951 3553320 We all got our reasons
for being here, right?

3554155 3557258 Sal, he's got that...
that house on the Cape, right?

3566467 3568903 All those medical bills,
uh, her therapy...

3570004 3572507 So, you really think,
for one second,

3572973 3575142 that I would give up
on my daughter

3575843 3578979 because of this...
this fucking hiccup? Do you?
3586687 3588322 Then let's go get this prick.

3594595 3596097 Names? No, I didn't get
their fucking names.

3596163 3598766 They were shooting at us.
Gotta be some undercover unit

3605739 3609477 No. And they're all armed.
Six of them, two unis.

3634835 3636904 Farrell, Potter,
get your asses up to ten.

3636971 3639140 Grab your coat. Let's roll.
Yeah.

3653522 3657224 They take a cut of every deal
that goes down on their turf.

3660294 3662463 It sends a message
that they're in charge.
3663230 3666568 They justify it by saying that they're underpaid,
3666934 3670404 that it's a necessary perk of the job.
3670971 3674509 They say that they're actually keeping the crime levels down.

3710144 3712647 All right, move, goddamn it!
Move out the fucking way!

from up there,

3772806 3775376 so they're still

3779013 3781750 Angel and me, we're gonna start

and go all the way up,

3785152 3787756 kicking every goddamn door
until you find 'em.

here for?

3846880 3850484 I... I can't
do what I used to.
3852853 3856423 I... I can't be a cop anymore.

4005974 4007742 He's walking into
a fucking ambush.
4008141 4010010 We... we need to get down there.

4057559 4061596 Grab there. Grab there.
Grab there. Climb down.

4274108 4276443 going down to the fucking lobby.

DOUG: I'm unarmed. I got no--

4361494 4363030 SAL: Drop the fuckin' gun,

4367335 4369670 Drop the fuckin' gun!
FRANK: Fuck. All right.

4417184 4418819 You weren't
supposed to come back.
4421155 4422990 Why the fuck did you come back?

4424959 4427595 You had to go cowboy,
didn't you?

4427662 4430898 Well, this is on you, Frank.
All of this is on you!

4441776 4444412 Show me her arm.
Let me see her arm.

4460261 4463130 MASON: All right, you two,

4463197 4467068 The less of us here,
the better. Go, go, go. (SIGHS)
4481682 4483184 Don't look at me like that.

4485886 4488656 I saw an opportunity
to help my family...

4496063 4498833 Why are you talking to him?

4504438 4506173 Go ahead, put her
in the bedroom.

4532633 4534301 How are you going
to explain that?

4536637 4538139 DOUG:
It doesn't have to be two.

4554221 4557258 Think of it as compensation
for your injury.

4558159 4560694 You deserve this.
MASON: Yeah, the fuck he does.

4560761 4563030 Listen, I'm done
with this asshole.
4563230 4566133 Hey, hey. Read my lips, okay?
4566500 4570071 It's either this or it's this.

do it for Sam.

4574308 4576644 If anyone, do it for Sam,

4576710 4577878 You know
that's all that matters.

4577945 4580981 You know what?
You got five seconds.

4587655 4590024 (CLEARLY) ...one!

is he talking about, 50?

4602703 4604038 You must be out

4604105 4605106 Hey, hey, come on,
come on, come on.

4605239 4606474 Hey, let me tell you something,

4606807 4608543 I'm giving this piece of shit
my cut, you're out of your--

4622723 4625860 (CLEARLY) Okay.
But you got some balls, Frank.

4626260 4628295 Let's go.
ANGEL: Let's get
the fuck out of here.

4630431 4634034 You did the right thing.
You did what you could for her.

4634101 4637037 One less junkie makes
the world a better place.

4678513 4681815 DOUG: Hey, hey, hey, hey!
Hey! Hey! Shit!

4704673 4706207 You said he wasn't going
to be a problem!

4706273 4708776 That he was going to help us
find out what this bitch knew.

4708842 4710311 Yeah, well, just...
just let me deal with him, okay?
4710377 4712146 No! Get your ass to the lobby

4712213 4713948 and make sure no one else
comes in the building.
4714014 4715749 Now, get the fuck out of here!

4717351 4719720 What do you want to do, Mase?

4722856 4724291 Hey, Sal, he got away. SAL: What?

4724358 4727061 Yeah, I want you to get
to that fire escape now!
4769470 4772373 (TENSE MUSIC PLAYS) He is going to go back to her.
4772906 4775075 So, Simms, you get to the fire escape at 11,
4775142 4777244 in case they try to climb to the roof or something.
4778178 4781115 Angel, you get to ten, wait outside her door.

4782349 4785052 No more fucking second chances
for this guy.
4810177 4812146 MASON: Sal, you there? I'm in position.

4817351 4819386 Just going to point it
right at that window.

4819654 4821422 AVA: Okay.
Gonna point it there.

4843477 4847314 Nobody move!
I'm gonna finish this myself.

4884853 4887087 Hey, man, the bitch
is still alive, man!
4905607 4907575 He just set the place on fire.

4924158 4925959 Hey, man, you got
a plan here or what?

4928763 4930565 The smoke is gonna
push 'em right to me.

4939641 4941643 Hey, man, what's going on?
Fuckin' audience here.

4948917 4951385 Shit. What are
we doing here, Mase?
4957157 4959126 Fuck this. I'm out of here.
4961094 4964264 Mason, the fuck are you-- Fuck it.

4969336 4971405 Mase, get the fuck out
of there, man.

4986420 4989056 Mase, what do you
want to do, man, huh?
5048983 5050317 What the fuck is going on?

5050384 5052020 This is a shit show.
We're out of here.

5057759 5060327 Hey. Just let him go.

5093761 5095930 DOUG: Holy Christ!

5100233 5101836 DOUG: They're down there,
last door!

5144112 5147615 (GROANS) All right,
all right, finish him.

5149584 5153788 Hey, you got him into this,
so you fucking finish him!

5432432 5435736 ♪ I know more Than I knew before ♪

lines: 117317 119186 Of course I'm gonna be there.

184351 185787 No, I do. I know. I hear you.

221689 223958 Fuck you.
I'm serious, though, you know?

238106 239674 Let's, uh...
let's just take it easy.

250417 252053 and stepping over here

253955 255288 This will just take a minute.

274709 276210 Whoa, whoa, whoa!

276276 278546 Get back! Move.

288189 289422 - Put it down.

387521 389991 But you're out,
so get on your fucking knees.

557958 559894 Hey, listen,
you don't need to...

561028 563731 Okay, all right,
I'm reading. Yeah.
573707 575209 - I asked if you were-- - Yeah, I know,

575276 578913 coming to the recital.
Yeah, I got it, I got it.
579480 582283 I got one for you. You ready? Okay.

602236 604905 Yeah, you like that?
I learned that one just for you.
605139 608642 I'm happy you're practicing. It's good. You need to.
614682 617118 Come on, Dad. You never missed one before.
619554 621222 Um... It's fine. I don't care anymore.
621322 622990 - I'm so over that. - No, no. It's... it's...

623057 626193 it's not about that.
You know, I'm not...

627194 630831 I'm not good in...
in crowds, and, uh...
631832 632833 I just don't know how much

632900 634135 I'd be able
to really appreciate--
634201 636070 The school can arrange for a hearing assistant,
640040 641842 - I would not want that. - Dad!
642376 644945 This is important to me. You gave me that guitar.
645012 647114 I want you to see how good I am.
655524 657258 I... I can't hear you. Um.
699300 700768 in this one. I fixed it.

703404 706040 Yeah, but it's not just
the hearing aids, Frank.

706473 709276 The damage to your cochlea,
it's becoming more progressive.

709743 711712 Back in July,
you got 50 percent,

711779 714583 and now you're down
to 30 percent.

721523 725627 Well, in another eleven,
I can't say with any certainty

725694 727962 how much ability
you'll have left.

760828 763330 You should listen to her.
She's smart.
764566 766534 I don't see much point myself.

768335 770605 Look, this isn't
the first time I'm saying this,

770672 773742 but... because of the nature

773807 775510 implants may not be an option.
776010 778178 And more exposure to loud noises

778245 780682 could lead
to even further damage.

780749 782617 You need to start

782684 785853 for the possibility of a more

my man.
Hey, hey, hey.

851151 853788 Hey. You don't need

856156 859126 Okay, we got two mid-level

859493 861495 single shots to the head,

867201 869370 but the medical examiner thinks
that the hit happened

I got this.

880247 882316 Okay. Good.
Can you tell me
what happened here?

882416 886186 I was going,
looking for a place to sleep...

886253 888088 ...and I...
I came across this guy.

891225 893628 They were in my spot,
these guys were...

905607 908008 They're there,
they shouldn't be there.

908075 911445 This isn't-- It's my spot.
That's where I have to be.

972206 976410 I'm a detective. I detect.
Can I get a beer?

982349 985553 So, how's the new beat
with the narc squad?

996163 998198 Kind of miss the view
from the sixth floor, though.

1013715 1016483 Come on, Frank, there's plenty

1019253 1021689 I don't know.
What the fuck do you call--
Deaf.
1023892 1024893 You know what I'm trying to say.

1024959 1026260 There's plenty of them
on the force.

1029062 1030330 you're better than half
the assholes out there.

1032366 1034536 Why? What are you gonna do?

1038540 1041041 The gold watch?
Fuck that, that's not you.

1041108 1043377 You'd go crazy.
Police is in your blood.
1046548 1049116 Fuck am I going to do?

1064666 1067467 Might have a lead
on those Hyde Park hits.

1079246 1081649 Official interpreter's off duty

1087154 1088890 I'm not
a fucking interpreter, Doug.

1089489 1091793 Brass says it can't wait.
It'll only take half an hour.

1091859 1094428 And look, this isn't me
just looking for help on a case.

1094494 1096430 This is a way for us
to get you back out there,

1096496 1097865 get you back
on your feet, you know,
1097932 1099000 so you get your feet wet again.

1103170 1106106 You help me, I help you.
That's what partners do.
1112880 1114448 I don't know, maybe I miss that.

1123524 1126293 I don't even have my weapon.
I'm off-duty.
1152987 1154589 She was in the alley that night.
1156490 1158860 Called it in via the 911 relay this morning.
1163397 1165399 Well, that's what we're going there to find out, partner.

1175409 1177145 Jesus Christ,
she's lucky she's deaf.

1178513 1180380 Doesn't have to listen
to that noise all day long.

1183417 1185352 This new clown
they've saddled me with,

1213614 1215382 You've been back
in the field, what? A month?

1220621 1222389 Didn't you always say
half of what we do

1222489 1224357 is like
a sixth sense thing, anyhow?

1288890 1293393 So, uh, we, um, uh,

1306339 1308576 Uh, he had an accident
about a year ago.

1342310 1344946 So, it, uh...
it looks like you're moving out.
1380147 1381515 Do you... do you read lips?
1381749 1383818 Does she... does she read lips?

1386921 1388856 Okay, so,

1395529 1398398 She was out,

1418286 1421389 - Just a little more time. - A little more time?
1422723 1424258 - Can we talk about this? - All right.
1431666 1433734 Now, can we get the fuck out of here?

1438873 1441642 You often out this late

1447682 1451152 It was a full moon.

1462863 1465099 Do you know any of these people?

1500267 1502636 Now, we're going to need

1503871 1505439 D, she can't see
your fucking face.

1506841 1511379 Uh, Ms. Fremont,

1511812 1513447 because that video file
is evidence,
1513514 1514782 but you'll get the phone back.

1514982 1518853 It's evidence,
but we'll get it back to you.

1519053 1520821 Now, I'm going
to write down

1520888 1522723 everything you've told us
here today,

1522790 1525092 and then you can read through it
and tell me

1525159 1527962 whether it's exactly
as you've described. Okay?

1628863 1631132 While you were pissing,

1632233 1634401 A couple of minors
for possession, stints in rehab.

1635035 1637004 Found a Naloxone kit
in her bathroom.

1638239 1640741 So, she was not out
taking pretty photos that night.

1645146 1647047 This place
must have been nice once.

1648115 1649783 I wonder what these units

1650451 1652786 When I hear about those perps,

1693628 1695896 You gotta be fucking kidding me.
1833133 1836604 I do not want to hurt you.
1845079 1847247 shut up. All right? Be cool.

1847414 1849383 Can't you see
the lady is disabled?

1866967 1869537 We know that. It's okay.

1870137 1872873 I just have
a couple of questions for you.

1887421 1891291 Okay. Okay. Okay.
Just one last question.
1892259 1895396 Did anyone else see the video?
1947515 1950317 I really am sorry about this.

1952219 1953888 It'd be so much better
for you...

1961962 1963363 Get back!
All right! Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!

1963430 1964899 Get the fuck back.
Gun on the floor.

1964965 1967501 All right! All right!
Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!

1977244 1978813 Look, this ain't
your business.
Get behind me.

1979046 1980882 Hey.
Put the fucking gun down!

1997765 2000234 Where's the fucking gun?
Where is the gun?!

2002269 2004672 Simms! Simms, get in here!
Shit!

2005874 2007709 South side! Take the stairs!

2017986 2019353 Come on, come on, come on.

2025392 2027294 You understand me? Do not shoot.

2035269 2037371 - No, no, no, no! Come on!

2056991 2058660 All right, Sal,
get back to the lobby.

2060160 2062229 Cover the elevator
at the bottom of the stairs.

2104104 2105540 They didn't have time
to make it to the lobby,

2105607 2107075 so they're still
in this building.

2107508 2109343 There's so many goddamn places
to hide in here.

2111746 2113681 I'm just saying,
if that dude has a phone,

2118418 2120755 Just take that elevator down
to the lobby, all right?

2121089 2122690 Go help Sal keep watch

2127528 2130632 Hey, Angel,
I'm on my way up to you.

2184451 2186721 I don't give a shit.
I need both of you now.

2187320 2189857 Yeah. Call me as soon
as you get here.

2192259 2193493 How you hanging
in there, brother?

2195730 2198099 Come on now,
you know that can't happen.
2200500 2202603 - Yeah, I need the medic. - You believe this shit?

2203071 2205472 Both stairwells, fire escapes,
and a fucking elevator.

to cover all that?

2212613 2214582 The elevator,
what floor it's on,

2217384 2218619 Look, I'll stay here
and hold point.

2218720 2220621 - No, no, no.
- Take the fire escapes outside.

2253654 2256256 They have to have someone
that's working for them

2264364 2267501 You called it in
this morning, right?

2271105 2272874 Probably in dispatch,

2272940 2275442 if anyone reports anything
about those murders.

2285318 2287420 ran your file,
so they got a look at it too.
2287722 2289322 They knew what you were into.
2297364 2298933 You went out looking to score.

2304272 2306941 I saw your overdose kit
in your bathroom,

2311411 2314615 Hey, I'm risking
my fucking ass here for you.

2331532 2335570 So, why did you wait two days
before you called it in?
2385620 2387454 We need to find a phone.

2391391 2396429 How many people
still in the building?
2413247 2415448 But I meant on this floor.

2430430 2434568 Hey, sweetheart.
You here for the party?
2444045 2446514 - Mother Teresa's on her way up. - Good.

2447782 2449850 Have them sweep
from the ground up,
2476310 2478179 I'll be back. But lock the door.

2513414 2515249 Got a gunshot wound
to the left--

2517785 2521622 No, I... I know the rules.
One, no names.

2523858 2526260 of any illegal activities
are to be discussed.

2526794 2528696 Three. I would
only participate in a job

2528763 2530131 that was agreed
through the broker.

2531232 2533934 In return, I will not reveal
any details of the job

2534001 2537304 to any third parties,
including law enforcement.
2537571 2538773 Do you agree to these rules?
2538839 2541510 Yes, yes, I agree to your rules.

2541575 2543277 Now, would you please
help the man?
2676110 2678145 but you better believe they're looking for one
2679947 2681949 Find out which of these apartments are still occupied
2685786 2688122 Make this clean. We don't want any witnesses.
2698432 2701502 connected to this building is rerouted to us.

2702770 2704972 If any of them get out,
if they talk to anyone,
2705406 2708543 then we are fucked. You understand that, right?

2709343 2711445 Everyone's got everything
on the line here,
2711513 2713214 so do not fuck this up.

2766568 2769003 That means they're gonna

2793528 2796063 They'll have someone down there.

2887921 2890424 Shit, he's on a phone.

2903237 2905740 ...hostage situation
at the York Building in Roxbury.
2908475 2910578 please, hold... I can't hear anything, so just listen.

2913046 2915449 Department C6,

2915550 2917519 to the York Building
in Roxbury, sixth floor.
2924893 2927629 Bedford Security, how can we help you? Hello?
2960528 2961729 Oh, fuck, he's got a weapon.

2965600 2967735 Motherfucker,
he took out the fucking camera.
2969537 2971205 Okay, I got him on ten.
2975275 2976511 What the fuck are you doing?

2983952 2985620 Nine! They're getting off

3031465 3035135 What the fuck?
I said no gunfire.

3036436 3038038 Yeah, but we don't
know that yet.

3038338 3040073 We're going to check
every goddamn apartment
3040140 3042577 on this floor. Now, go, go.

3071405 3073608 Don't fucking move. I'll blow

3108643 3110645 Get on the floor or she's dead.

3118586 3122122 You dumb, deaf fuck
with an empty gun.

3137772 3139907 They're here right now!
Both of them are here right now!

3191324 3193326 Hey,
where the hell are they?

3201401 3204438 Fuck. They were here
and then they, uh...

3225526 3228261 Hey, hey! What were
they doing in here?
3228328 3229997 Why did they leave my gun?

3234334 3236369 what the fuck
were they doing in here, huh?

3245278 3247782 Fuck, man!
And I just bought that, too.

3247949 3250551 - Here, take this fucking gun.
- All right.

3276944 3279446 No, no. Wait.
He can't hear anything.

3279814 3282617 The medic was talking to him,
but he didn't hear a thing.

3282884 3284919 The man wears
hearing aids, Angel.

3289590 3292392 He's gonna call 911 and dispatch
is gonna lead us right to him.

3292459 3294327 Well,
maybe he's smarter than that.

3303604 3306774 Yeah, I need you to run
a trace on a cell. Yes, now.
3320521 3322256 All I hear is that music, man.
3325259 3326694 Just go that way. Go, go.

3342710 3344912 You want me to get the fuck
out of the way? Why don't you--

3363164 3366100 Get the fuck out
of the truck, asshole.

3376177 3379412 Come on, get out the truck.
Get this bullshit out of here.

3379479 3382250 Simms, stop playing
goddamn traffic cop

are these people?

3387387 3389690 Does anyone have
anything at all?

3394295 3396230 And can someone
please find the asshole

3397698 3399734 and clear him
the fuck out of here?
3466499 3468703 What the hell is going on? Doug, wait, listen.

3468803 3471072 I... I can't hear shit.
My hearing aids are toast.

3473341 3475409 Listen, Doug,
I'm with Ava Fremont,

3477244 3479647 Look, she's in danger.
And I am too.

3479714 3482516 I can't hear a fucking thing,
so I need you to put your face

3482583 3484518 close to the screen
when you're talking,

3484618 3486420 Ava's gonna try
to... to read your lips
3486486 3488189 and tell me what you're saying.

3501369 3502870 What if they send units?
No, no, no.

3502970 3504705 Farrell and Potter,
they'll pull rank,

3504772 3506974 let everybody know that
we have it all under control,

3509543 3511045 The overdose story
don't work no more.

3511112 3512446 Angel,
we're gonna be the ones

3514115 3517218 Whatever we say is
the story is the story.

3517318 3520087 Yeah, well, what if we just
threaten them instead, huh?

3520321 3521922 What if, uh,
you know, we tell them,

3521989 3523824 if they talk, we'll come
after them and their family?

3523891 3528429 You really think that this guy
is intimidated by us? Hmm?

3528596 3530331 - I don't know.
- If someone here talks,

3531665 3534201 And someone will break,
you better believe that.

3536170 3539140 You really think that Simms
is gonna keep his mouth shut,

3539473 3540641 if it means covering
his own ass?

3542710 3545679 You really wanna bet
your future on some patrol cop?

3547481 3549884 All right, then, look, brother,
listen to me, listen to me.

3550951 3553320 We all got our reasons
for being here, right?

3554155 3557258 Sal, he's got that...
that house on the Cape, right?

3566467 3568903 All those medical bills,
uh, her therapy...

3570004 3572507 So, you really think,
for one second,

3572973 3575142 that I would give up
on my daughter

3575843 3578979 because of this...
this fucking hiccup? Do you?
3586687 3588322 Then let's go get this prick.

3594595 3596097 Names? No, I didn't get
their fucking names.

3596163 3598766 They were shooting at us.
Gotta be some undercover unit

3605739 3609477 No. And they're all armed.
Six of them, two unis.

3634835 3636904 Farrell, Potter,
get your asses up to ten.

3636971 3639140 Grab your coat. Let's roll.
Yeah.

3653522 3657224 They take a cut of every deal
that goes down on their turf.

3660294 3662463 It sends a message
that they're in charge.
3663230 3666568 They justify it by saying that they're underpaid,
3666934 3670404 that it's a necessary perk of the job.
3670971 3674509 They say that they're actually keeping the crime levels down.

3710144 3712647 All right, move, goddamn it!
Move out the fucking way!
